text: Reflecting on 2011, we have done some amazing things to create engaging learning opportunities in our school. Where did the ideas come from? Watch the video…
I would like to twitter/ blog with colleagues about teaching for sustainability ( wetlands, recycling, gardening, natural habitats, energy. I thought I would put it out there.
This is really great Edna. Great reflection of a year’s work which puts it out there for others to learn from as well.
Such a great post to share with colleagues on the power of a PLN and collaboration. Thank you !
I agree with caraleeb -great post about power of PLN.  I’ll tweet on!

Hi, My name is Katelyn Callahan and I am a student at the University of South Alabama. I am taking a course called EDM310, we use a lot of the same sources to get ideas for our class. I never thought that these things could be used in such a way, but have taught me so many things!Thanks for the video!Katelyn
So many inspirational ideas. We are on a journey of enriching our collaboration so now I am evn more inspired. Thanks for sharing.
Thanks for the comments. I have learned so much in this past year by connecting with others around the world…
